casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Clarence Joseph TRENT 272P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 11, 2017 Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, for Trent, Clarence Joseph. Carole Biggers, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of August 2017 by Defendant for Temporary Stay: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of August 2017." Morgan, J. recused
